column5: I'm sure it's not a good sign.

Just how tall is it, really?
I think it's... probably at least
fifty thousand arge in total height.
The tower needs to be able to send the
Astrolabe's power to all four continents...

How are we supposed to get up there?

But we do have one suggestion.#0E
The climate of La Worg has
been restored to normal, so we
should be able save her now.
We will try searching for a way to
stop the flow of the astral power
from our temples to the tower.#0E
